TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RuleActionTrackingEvent extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: Contient le nom, l'ID d'instance et le résultat de condition d'une règle qui a été évaluée.

span.span: Contains the name, instance ID, and condition result of a rule that has been evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Examples L'exemple de code suivant montre comment utiliser la classe .The following code example shows how to use the class.
